justification: Trade hints B might like a Tier 1 TE buy-low, but doesn’t explicitly model B’s consensus-trusting, rookie-upside, and playoff-SOS focus (King is a young breakout with tough playoff slate; Walker has tough playoff matchups). A’s rationale notes RB stability and TE playoff outlook, but acquiring another Doubtful TE conflicts with A’s injury-averse profile. Internally coherent on volatility and schedule, yet weak on why B would surrender King. Explanation is brief and light on B’s incentives.
